Detailed Description

template<typename PTYPE>
class OOPointer< PTYPE >

A class to represent a C pointer inside an NSValue object for ref counting and so it can be stored inside the OSX buffs NSArray, NSDictionary etc.

Usage: 

 OOPointer<void *> ptr = malloc(1000);
 void *p = ptr;
